title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders or tool callers inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat-like interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, tools support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama models inside workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and tool-call deserialization.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda external-task workers that invoke Ollama models for human-task suggestions or summarization.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside notes and get inline completions.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers DMs and mentions using any Ollama model; deploy via Docker.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour, streaming, and telemetry events.
